# goal: run PURC 2.0 on Hemionitidoid longread (PacBio) data on the HYAK cluster.

## preparing files

to start, we need to convert our .bam files to .fasta.
in the `/mmfs1/gscratch/tribblelab/hemionitidoid_longreads` dir:

```{bash}
conda activate pacbio
bam2fasta -o pentpoolA.fasta m64044_221017_183110.subreads.demux.pentpoolA--pentpoolA.bam
bam2fasta -o pentpoolB.fasta m64044_221017_183110.subreads.demux.pentpoolB--pentpoolB.bam
```
